core.interaction_error: uh oh, it looks like something **went wrong** behind the scenes, sorry about that...
core.missing_argument: i couldn't figure out what you said for **%1$s**, try checking the **command usage**
core.missing_permission: i need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to do that
core.missing_user_permission: you need the **%1$s** permission in this **%2$s** to do that
core.owner_only: this command **can only be used** by **my developers**, nice try tho

user.name: user
user.description: the user you want to look up

cash.name: cash
cash.description: check how much money you have
cash.self: according to my records, you have $%2$s in your wallet
cash.other: after a quick search, i found that %1$s has $%2$s in their wallet

user.name: user
user.description: the user you want to check

cat.name: cat
cat.description: gracefully displays a cat for your viewing pleasure

commands.name: commands
commands.description: glance through all my commands & categories

daily.name: daily
daily.description: claim your daily allowance once every 20 hours
daily.cooldown: slow your roll my guy, you still have another %1$s left on the clock
daily.no_bots: oops, bot accounts aren't allowed to receive dailies. do you have anyone else in mind?
daily.self: ## %1$s yippee! you redeemed your daily reward of $%2$s
daily.other: ## %1$s that's very kind. you sent your daily reward of $%2$s to %3$s

streak.hint: come back again in **20 hours** to start a streak and earn even more cash
streak.started: you've started a streak! claim your dailies **every 20 hours** to keep it going!
streak.continued: keep up the great work, your streak has reached day %1$s. come back tomorrow at %2$s to earn more!
streak.ended: sadly, you waited too long and your streak of %1$s was lost. your longest streak ever was %2$s days

user.name: user
user.description: someone you'd like to donate your daily to

dog.name: dog
dog.description: fetches a dog from the depths of the internet

evaluate.name: evaluate
evaluate.description: enable eval prompts for this channel (devs only)

feedback.name: feedback
feedback.description: have an idea? let my devs know what you're thinking
feedback.disclaimer:
## %1$s you are sending feedback to the sandra developers
please try to include __as much information as possible__ to ensure your concerns are understood
*do not abuse this command, otherwise you may be barred from submitting feedback in the future*

select the type of feedback you'd like to submit below
feedback.waiting: %1$s i'm patiently awaiting your input... if you clicked out on accident, just **use the command** again
feedback.unavailable: for some reason i'm unable to submit your feedback. please join the [support server](%1$s) and let my devs know. i've attached your answers below so you don't have to type it out again
feedback.bug_description: the bot is acting up and it's bugging me
feedback.suggest_description: got an idea for a new feature?
feedback.other_description: love what you're seeing? let the devs know
feedback.cancel_description: just kidding, i'll be going now
feedback.thanks:
## %1$s thank you for your feedback!
the devs will read your submission and get back to you if necessary

modal.title: sandra feedback
modal.summary_label: in a few words, what's going on?
modal.description_placeholder: go ahead, yap about it here

fortune.name: fortune
fortune.description: break open a fortune cookie to reveal your luck
fortune.reply:
as the cookie crumbles in your fingers, it reveals a piece of paper that reads

`%1$s`

help.name: help
help.description: look at some basic & essential info about me

command.name: command
command.description: the command you want to take a closer look at

help.not_found: whoops, i **couldn't find** that command. try using **/commands** to find what you're looking for
help.required_arguments: any options that are surrounded by <> are required
help.extra_help: need some extra help? chat with us

info_embed.title: *your favorite neighborhood robot* <:fun:987918991135764542>
info_embed.configure_content: > if you need to **configure** my **settings**, use `/config`
info_embed.commands_content: > or if you want to see my **command list**, use `/commands`
info_embed.invite_content: > would you like me to join **your server**? **[click to invite me](%1$s)**
info_embed.support_content: > need **more help**? chat with us in **[sandra's hangout](%1$s)**

8ball.name: 8ball
8ball.description: seek guidance from the spherical one
8ball.too_long: my lord, it appears that the **magic 8 ball** will only understand **more simple questions**, i'm afraid
8ball.reply:
## %1$s %2$s asks: %3$s
after vigorously shaking the **magic 8 ball**, the answer slowly appears: **%4$s**

question.name: question
question.description: the all powerful requires a question to answer

members.name: members
members.description: gander at a breakdown of the server's member count
members.reply: **%1$s** has %2$s humans and %3$s bots for a total of %4$s members

owner.name: owner
owner.description: useful commands to help manage the bot (devs only)

avatar.name: avatar
avatar.description: upload a new avatar for the current account

ping.name: ping
ping.description: sends a ping to test sandra's connection to discord
ping.reply: it took me %1$s to **ping discord** and about %2$s to **receive your command**

reputation.name: reputation
reputation.description: send someone a meaningless reputation point
reputation.cooldown: woah there, hold your horses! you still have another %1$s left on the clock
reputation.no_bots: sorry pal, bots aren't allowed to receive reputation points. go on now, try someone else
reputation.no_self: as hard as you may try, you can't give yourself reputation points. pick someone else
reputation.reply: you sent %1$s a reputation point! they now have %2$s rep thanks to you

user.name: user
user.description: the person you want to disappoint

roll.name: roll
roll.description: test your luck with an imaginary dice set

sides.name: sides
sides.description: the number of sides your dice has

roll.reply: you took a chance and rolled a %1$s out of %2$s

softban.name: softban
softban.description: gently ban someone, deletes their recent messages
softban.no_self: you can't softban yourself, that would be too much fun
softban.already_banned: **%1$s** is already banned from this server; **%2$s**
softban.no_owner: sorry to rain on your parade, but you can't softban the server owner
softban.no_interact: hey! you're not allowed to do that, %1$s has a role higher than yours
softban.no_interact_self: this is embarrassing, but i don't have a role high enough to interact with %1$s
softban.ban_notification:
## %1$s you have been soft-banned from %2$s
you should be able to rejoin the server at any time, but you may need to be invited again

>>> **%3$s** gave the reason: **%4$s**
softban.confirmation:
## %1$s are you sure you want to softban %2$s?
their most recent messages will be deleted and cannot be recovered
softban.success: %1$s **%2$s** has been soft-banned from this server. now, who's gonna invite them back?

quiet.name: quiet
quiet.description: let's just keep this between you and me?

shards.name: shards
shards.description: view a list of shards and their stats
shards.server_using: â€¢ this server is using shard %1$d

toss.name: toss
toss.description: toss a coin and settle your bets
reply: spinning like a top, the coin dances before you and finally settles on __**%1$s**__
you toss the coin and catch it in mid air, slapping it down on your wrist revealing __**%1$s**__
the coin tumbles from your fingers, clattering on the ground and landing on __**%1$s**__
